review: We had a Roku previously for our bedroom TV.  We recently purchased the Fire TV stick to replace the Roku.  It is user friendly and has all the apps that we could want or need.  The nice features are the remote and the footprint of the unit.  The stick is plugged in behind our TV.... out of sight!  It is also cool that it is portable, so we can take it with us when we travel.
author: Contagioncat

review: This is a bad product, not ready for consumer use. It's performs way below it's specs and description.

review: I liked it except that Fire TV Stick is clearly designed to incourage the purchase of Amazon products. It takes a number of steps to access other apps. Let me be clear that I like various Amazon products and buy them but I do not like to feel controlled and directed.

review: At first I was disappointed that the stick requires a power cord that has to be pluged in. However it was quickly forgotten once I started using the device. It is very easy to use.
